data.title: Please refrain from noisy behavior
data.meta_description: Poster, 'Please refrain from noisy behavior',  part of Seibu Railway 'Manner Poster' series, offset printed on paper, created by Yokoyama Yumiko (art director) and Kadowaki Takahiro (illustrator) for Dentsu Inc. under commission from The Seibu Railway Co., Ltd, September 2018
data.meta_site_name: Victoria and Albert Museum: Explore the Collections
data.text:
Brief description

Poster, 'Please refrain from noisy behavior', part of Seibu Railway 'Manner Poster' series, offset printed on paper, created by Yokoyama Yumiko (art director) and Kadowaki Takahiro (illustrator) for Dentsu Inc. under commission from The Seibu Railway Co., Ltd, September 2018
